root.name: Lunar: Walking School
root.description: OverviewLunar: Walking School is a Japanese RPG released for the Game Gear that follows the adventures of Ellie and her friend Lena at the newly founded magic school. The game is spin-off of the Lunar series that takes place before the events of Lunar: The Silver Star. Walking School was developed by Studio Alex and published by Game Arts exclusively in Japan on January 12, 1995 but in 2009 an unofficial English translation patch was released by Aeon Genesis. A remake of Walking School was later created for the Sega Saturn in 1997 titled Magic School Lunar!
